data.meta_description: Follow the big news from Germany, discover off-beat news from Berlin and other cities. Read in-depth features that help you understand how Germans think.
data.text:
German politics

What's making news in Germany? From Bundestag debates to political controversy and pressing social issues, we bring you the stories and the people behind the headlines.

Immigration and German citizenship

Germany wants to revamp its immigration system and citizenship laws to make it easier for foreign skilled workers to come to the country and fill job vacancies that are at a record high.
